sentences.cn: 衣帽间 / 停车服务员；博物馆接待员

sentences.en: An attendant was sluicing out the changing rooms.
sentences.cn: 一位服务员正在冲洗更衣室.

sentences.en: An attendant will pass them around after we take off.
Belinda's attendant spirits have an uneasy foreboding of catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 伺候贝琳达的精灵们不安地预感到灾难即将来临.

sentences.en: He arrived with an attendant nurse.
However, Lydgate was installed as medical attendant on the Vincys.
sentences.cn: 但不管怎样, 利德盖特现在成了文西家的医生.

sentences.en: I asked the attendant to conduct him to the door / conduct him out.
sentences.cn: 我让服务员领他们到门口[领他出去].

sentences.en: Mr Branson's victory, and all the attendant publicity, were well deserved.
sentences.cn: 布兰森先生的胜利，以及随之而来的关注度，都是理所应当的。

sentences.en: One of the difficulties attendant on shift work is lack of sleep.
sentences.cn: 轮班工作制带来的困难之一是睡眠不足.

sentences.en: She was interrupted by the entrance of an attendant.
sentences.cn: 服务员进来,打断了她的话.

sentences.en: Such patients run an increased probability of hospitalization, with all the attendant costs to the patient and to the health care system that hospitalization entails.
sentences.cn: 此类患者趋于住院治疗的的几率增加，随之而来的患者和医疗保健系统住院治疗所承担的费用也增加。

sentences.en: The girl attendant has set about cleaning the room.
sentences.cn: 那位女服务员已开始打扫房间.

sentences.en: The great ship with her attendant destroyers plodded on.
sentences.cn: 那艘巨舰率同护卫的驱逐舰徐缓地向前驶去.

sentences.en: The Prince was followed by his attendants.
The room attendant comes in with two thermoses of hot water.
sentences.cn: 服务员送水到他们的房间.

sentences.en: We met the officer attendant on the general.
sentences.cn: 我们见到了随从将军的副官.

sentences.en: What does the flight attendant ask John to do?
sentences.cn: 飞机服务员要求约翰干什么?

sentences.en: Your Willoughby is your devoted attendant.
sentences.cn: 你的威洛比是你忠实的仆人.

words.tran_cn: 出席；上（大学等）；照料；招待；陪伴

trans.tran_en: relating to or caused by something
someone whose job is to look after or help customers in a public place
